name: Winter Citrus Salad With Black Pepper, Feta, and Mint
description: Colorful citrus is finished with turns of black pepper and a shower of salty feta and fresh mint.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel citrus using a knife to remove as much white pith as possible. Slice into wheels about 1/4-inch thick, discarding any seeds. Layer fruit on a large serving platter, overlapping slices.
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar and honey and season with salt. Drizzle vinaigrette over salad and garnish with mint, feta and pepper. Serve immediately.
